desc: Students study the role of music in worship with an emphasis on strategies for developing music groups, including handbells and Orff instruments, in worship and church education. Prerequisite: Music 214 or permission of instructor. Offered fall semester 2010-11 and alternate years.
name: Church Music Pract I
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 214 or permission of instructor. Offered fall semester 2010-11 and alternate years.
title: Church Music Practicum I
